name: Chromasphere
description:
Player Beware : Game tends to get messy pretty fast

Chromasphere

Chromasphere is a a twin-stick shooter where you have to protect a central sphere, source of colors. Your goal is to protect it to keep the colors alive.

Controls Keyboard / Mouse

Move : WASD or Arrow Keys

Aim : Mouse

Shoot : Left Click

Refill : Stay in the circle

Xbox Controller

Move : Left Stick

Aim : Right Stick

Shoot : Right Trigger

Refill : Stay in the circle
